mapper.select: select id, box_code, label_code, box_name, area, business_bureau, camp_service, job_number, img_url, status, exception_type, exception_info, create_time from obd-scan.pc_obd_box where id = #{id}

select id, box_code, label_code, box_name, area, business_bureau, camp_service, job_number, img_url, status, exception_type, exception_info, create_time from obd-scan.pc_obd_box limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into obd-scan.pc_obd_box(box_code, label_code, box_name, area, business_bureau, camp_service, job_number, img_url, status, exception_type, exception_info, create_time) values (#{boxCode}, #{labelCode}, #{boxName}, #{area}, #{businessBureau}, #{campService}, #{jobNumber}, #{imgUrl}, #{status}, #{exceptionType}, #{exceptionInfo}, #{createTime})

insert into obd-scan.pc_obd_box(box_code, label_code, box_name, area, business_bureau, camp_service, job_number, img_url, status, exception_type, exception_info, create_time) values
(#{entity.boxCode}, #{entity.labelCode}, #{entity.boxName}, #{entity.area}, #{entity.businessBureau}, #{entity.campService}, #{entity.jobNumber}, #{entity.imgUrl}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.exceptionType}, #{entity.exceptionInfo}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into obd-scan.pc_obd_box(box_code, label_code, box_name, area, business_bureau, camp_service, job_number, img_url, status, exception_type, exception_info, create_time) values
(#{entity.boxCode}, #{entity.labelCode}, #{entity.boxName}, #{entity.area}, #{entity.businessBureau}, #{entity.campService}, #{entity.jobNumber}, #{entity.imgUrl}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.exceptionType}, #{entity.exceptionInfo}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update box_code = values(box_code) , label_code = values(label_code) , box_name = values(box_name) , area = values(area) , business_bureau = values(business_bureau) , camp_service = values(camp_service) , job_number = values(job_number) , img_url = values(img_url) , status = values(status) , exception_type = values(exception_type) , exception_info = values(exception_info) , create_time = values(create_time)
mapper.update:
update obd-scan.pc_obd_box
box_code = #{boxCode},
label_code = #{labelCode},
box_name = #{boxName},
area = #{area},
business_bureau = #{businessBureau},
camp_service = #{campService},
job_number = #{jobNumber},
img_url = #{imgUrl},
status = #{status},
exception_type = #{exceptionType},
exception_info = #{exceptionInfo},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
